title: Morning & Night

questions.text: I feel most awake and energized...
choices: Early morning - I'm a natural early bird
Late morning once I've had time to wake up
Afternoon and evening - I peak later in the day
Late at night - I come alive after dark

questions.text: On weekends, my ideal wake-up time would be...
choices: Same as weekdays - I like consistency
A bit later, but still before 9am
Mid-morning - let's sleep in a little
As late as possible - weekends are for sleeping

questions.text: For quality time together, I'd prefer...
choices: Morning coffee or breakfast together
Daytime activities and adventures
Evening hangs after the day winds down
Late night talks when everything's quiet

questions.text: When it comes to bedtime, I usually...
choices: Get tired early and like being in bed by 10pm
Aim for a reasonable hour but it varies
Stay up later than I probably should
I'm a true night owl - midnight is just the beginning

questions.text: If we have different sleep schedules, I hope we...
choices: Find a middle ground that works for both
Respect each other's rhythms without pressure to change
Have some overlap time but also our own routines
Slowly sync up over time

description: Discover if you're early birds, night owls, or something in between.
